ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T02:32:48 [Issue ID 4000-357375] urn:comicvine:4000-357375
ComicInfo.Summary: Bleeding Cool, the comics and entertainment source for news, interviews, and the latest gossip and scuttlebutt is coming to your local comic shop! Featuring Rich Johnston's trademark knack for delivering the biggest stories and interviews, this value-priced initial issue of Bleeding Cool Magazine will introduce you to the magazine event of the year. As well as loads of juicy articles from Rich Johnston, we have full coverage of the rise of Valiant Comics! We provide an exclusive look at the most anticipated reincarnation in comics from the past decade as well as behind the scenes details and sneak peeks! Also look for news and scoops about this summer's biggest events from Top Cow, IDW, Dark Horse, Image, Boom, Avatar, Marvel and DC! As you enjoy this special introductory issue, prepare yourself for the full-length regular magazine launch in October as every issue of Bleeding Cool Magazine will deliver the information, features, and gotta have insights you need to rule the comics' scene. With coverage of the most creative publishers and exciting characters, Bleeding Cool Magazine is the essential source for collectors looking to get features you can't find on the web. Over a million monthly BleedingCool.com visitors can't be wrong!
ComicInfo.Title: Valiant Returns
